promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute rare bird psychic-type wearing a regal crown. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or psychic. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regalight, a chibi cute rare bird psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: psycho-cut, light-that-burns-the-sky. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word bird or psychic or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, bird-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Regalight perches in secret crypts, dazzling foes with its light. Possesses mysterious psychic powers to cut and scorch their way.
